thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo works out ahead of Real Madrid clash | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo works out ahead of Real Madrid clash | Daily Mail Online

author: Daniel Matthews For Mailonline
title: Cristiano Ronaldo works out ahead of Real Madrid clash | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Ronaldo netted Madrid's second goal at Villarreal as they came from 2-0 down to move back to the top of La Liga. The victory means they lead Barcelona by a point and have a game in hand on Luis Enrique's side. Wednesday's clash with Las Palmas is the first in a run of four matches in 11 days for Madrid, who still have to host Barcelona and Atletico before the end of the season. Ronaldo hauled his side level from the penalty spot with 15 minutes left against Villarreal The Champions League holders are still fighting on two fronts and remain on course to become the first team in the competition's history to retain the title. Madrid travel to Napoli a week on Tuesday, leading 3-1 from the first leg of their last-16 tie. Ronaldo did not score in the clash at the Bernabeu and has only netted twice in seven European appearances this season. But the Portugal international looks to be finding his form at a crucial time for Zinedine Zidane's side - having netted in his last two appearances. RELATED ARTICLES
